summary: A letter from Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss to the Metropolitan Detention Center Legal Department providing the password for a drive and CD containing discovery materials in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Author of the letter providing passwords for discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being provided.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is prosecuting the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Discovery Materials Password Provided
events.description: Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss sends passwords for a drive and CD containing discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case to the Metropolitan Detention Center Legal Department.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal letter from Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss dated November 18, 2020.
It provides the password for a drive and a CD containing discovery materials related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The letter is addressed to the Legal Department of the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn, NY.
The case referenced is United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating an active federal prosecution.
The document demonstrates the procedural handling of sensitive discovery materials in a high-profile case.
